description: This is a current list of approved security guard schools.  The Security Guard Act of 1992 requires registration and training of security guards in New York State. The Division of Criminal Justice Services (DCJS) approves the private security training schools and provides administrative oversight for mandated security training.

metadata.attribution: New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services
